sources.title: Shed No Tears (1948 )
sources.description: Shed No Tears ( 1948 )black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @ https://colab.research.google.com/  Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: https://rife-vfi.github.io  A.I. Upscaling to 4K: https://ffmpeg.org  GPU: Google Colab

metadata.Plot: Pål dreams about success within the musical world, but he has an obstacle; himself. His deep thoughts keeps him end up in trouble. We follow Pål on a emotional inner travel to find his call on the swedish west coast of Gothenburg.
metadata.Actors: Marie Richardson, Adam Lundgren, Josefin Neldén
